body: I guess, if you wanted to test that it actually returned 5, you'd have to say `*any.try_get<int>() == 5`, which would then promptly segfault if you had got it wrong?
body_html: I guess, if you wanted to test that it actually returned 5, you'd have to say *any.try_get<int>() == 5, which would then promptly segfault if you had got it wrong?
